channel.title: Technologies on Consortium of Ohio Libraries
channel.description: Recent content in Technologies on Consortium of Ohio Libraries

item.title: Technology
item.description:
The Consortium of Ohio Libraries integrates a broad spectrum of open source technology to support day-to-day library operations, while collaborating with a carefully curated set of technology partners to provide a superior quality of service to our growing library community.
Evergreen ILS Evergreen is a highly-scalable, fully-featured open source ILS that is currently used by over 2,000 libraries both in the US and internationally, with an active and growing community of developers and users.
